goal: Quick swarm hello-world: add a tiny math util + one test, in parallel

steps.task: Create a tiny TypeScript utility module at src/math-utils.ts that exports a single function add(a: number, b: number): number. Keep it boring. No new deps. Add a short top-of-file comment.
Create a mocha test at test/math-utils.test.ts that imports add() from src/math-utils.ts and asserts add(2, 3) === 5. Run npm test and include the output in the transcript. No extra tests.
